# susbuilder

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of susbuilder is to create data needed for a new instance of Sus, or to rebuild the data necessary for an already existing instance.

## Installation

You can install the development version of susbuilder from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("MSSI-urban/susbuilder")
```
